criticisms.subject: unused helper function
criticisms.description: The function formatDate() is defined but never called anywhere in the codebase. Consider removing it to reduce code bloat.

criticisms.subject: dead export in types
criticisms.description: The exported type UserSettings is not imported anywhere. This adds unnecessary symbols to the module namespace.

criticisms.subject: complex parser logic
criticisms.description: This parsing function has 7 levels of nesting. Consider using early returns or extracting helper functions to improve readability.

criticisms.subject: auth flow needs tests
criticisms.description: The authentication module has no test coverage. Adding tests for login, logout, and token refresh would improve reliability.
